img_summary: The image depicts "Ginseng Pellets," a rare consumable item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item, crafted at the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after completing a specific quest, slowly restores Focus for a short duration when used. It requires 1 Licorice and 1 Aged Ginseng as crafting materials.
